title: Add search modal with Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut
description: Implements search functionality with Ctrl+K shortcut, keyboard navigation, click-outside-to-close, and accessible/responsive Tailwind styling
reviewComments: Clean implementation. SearchModal has proper accessibility (ARIA roles, keyboard navigation). useKeyboardShortcut hook handles cross-platform Ctrl/Cmd. Dark mode support. Note: App.tsx still has Vite demo - will need merge resolution with Homepage.

title: Theme Toggle (Dark/Light Mode)
description: Adds theme toggle functionality with dark/light mode support. Features include ThemeContext with localStorage persistence, ThemeToggle component with sun/moon icons, class-based Tailwind dark mode, and system preference detection.
reviewComments: Clean theme implementation. ThemeContext uses localStorage persistence and respects system prefers-color-scheme. ThemeToggle has proper accessibility. ThemeProvider wraps app correctly. Will need merge with Homepage to position toggle properly.
buildOutput: npm run build succeeded - 33 modules, built in 856ms
